ENGLISH: You call on the head of your intelligence service and tell them to prepare to send [From.GetFirstName] a a coded message. What do you want the message to be?
You call on the head of your intelligence service and tell them to prepare to send [FromFrom.GetFirstName] a letter! What do you want the message to be?
Send [From.GetFirstName] a simple letter, complimenting them and wishing them good health.
Remind [From.GetFirstName] that [From.GetSheHe] is lower than the worms crawling in the dirt!
Send [From.GetFirstName] a coded message inquiring about whether or not they will help you in furthering your agenda. Whatever that may be...
Have your ally launch a coup to replace their liege
Instruct your associate to smuggle weapons into their country and stir anti-government actors. Be warned, them failing could have serious consequences!
This option is available because this person is your §YTrusted Associate§!
send a letter requesting assistance from this ruler.
Instruct your associate to declare war against their leige and throw their realm into chaos. Be warned, them failing could have serious consequences!
This option is available because this person is your §YTrusted Associate§!
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has responded positively to your letter. A fortnight after your first message you recieve a coded message indicating [FromFrom.GetSheHe] would assist you in your plots.
Your associate's letter was intercepted! Their leader did not seem to be pleased when they read its contents...

Your associate [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] has successfully set up a smuggling operation in [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] country! Terrorists have become suspiciously well-armed and coordinated and no one suspects it was you!
Instruct your associate to steal an artifact from their leader's treasury.
Your associate [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]'s operation was a success! They managed to steal the artifact and sneak it back to you unnoticed!
Like a thief in the night...!
Instruct your associate to steal gold and valuables from their leader and bring it to you.

Your associate [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s operation was a success! In the middle of the night, [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] broke into his leader's manse and swiped as many valuables as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] could before ducking away unnoticed.
And no one suspects it was me...
The head of your Intelligence Service has recieved a response from [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]! They have agreed to help you in your wars and will soon join you on the battlefield!
you letter is found by your associate's host
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has returned a response to your letter. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] expresses gratitude for your compliments and wishes you well.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has not responded to the letter you sent [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. You are unsure if [FromFrom.GetSheHe] even read it.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has accepted your order to declare war on their liege on your behalf. Even if they fail, this will surely bring chaos to the region..

Your associate [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has successfully deposed [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] leader! In the dead of night [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] entourage arrested the leader and whisked them away. [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] now holds the power. No traces of your involvment have been evident so far...
Your associate [target_coup.GetTitledFirstName] has overthrown their leader but the state remains unstable. [target_coup.GetSheHeCap] requests long-term assistance and offers to pay tribute to you.
I'm afraid you're on your own, friend.
You instruct your associate to infiltrate [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s court...
Now wait for my next order.
Send this character a letter! It costs 5 Gold to send a letter
You must prepare society members to move before you move them to another court!
Call your member back to your court from the current court they are in
Move your member to this court!
A network of terrorist groups have made their home in this county.
Introduce your two friends together, in hopes that they'll become friends too!
Have your associate return to your court
Send your associate to this court
Prepare your spy to move to another court
Have this character join your secret agency and do your bidding
